While lurking underground, the user grabs a target and drags them into the earth, leaving only their head above the surface. Because victims are rendered unable to move in this state, they are easily subjected to torture or decapitation. Such extreme measures are not required, however;<ref name="d1"/> when [[Kakashi Hatake]] uses this on [[Sasuke Uchiha]], it is only to restrain Sasuke. Sasuke is eventually able to free himself.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 7</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In the ''[[Naruto Collectible Card Game]]'', [[Deidara]] grabbing Sasuke from within his [[C1]] bird is labelled as this technique.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 360, page 17</ref>
